verses.roman:
jagannātha dekhi' punaḥ nija-ghare āilā
prasāda ānāñā bhakta-gaṇe khāoyāilā

synonyms: jagannātha dekhi'-after seeing Lord Jagannātha; punaḥ—again; nija-ghare—to His residence; āilā—returned; prasāda—prasāda; ānāñā—causing to be brought; bhakta-gaṇe khāoyāilā—fed the devotees.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu returned to His residence after visiting the temple of Jagannātha, He asked for a large quantity of Lord Jagannātha's prasāda, which He then distributed among His devotees so that they could eat sumptuously.
